entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
